SEARCH
Package me.river.royaltisapi.core.managers

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
me.river.royaltisapi.core.managers.UserManager
@DependsOn("socketIOServer") public class UserManager extends Object
This class manages all users in the game. It handles user connections, disconnections, location updates, and item removals.

  • Method Details

    • removeUserBySessionId

      public boolean removeUserBySessionId(UUID sessionId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Removes a user from the system based on their session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the user was removed successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user with the given session ID is not found.

    • getUserBySessionId

      public User getUserBySessionId(UUID sessionId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves a user by their session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object if found.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user with the given session ID is not found.

    • handleClientDisconnect

      public void handleClientDisconnect(com.corundumstudio.socketio.SocketIOClient client)
      Handles the disconnection of a client from the server. This method attempts to disconnect the user from their lobby and remove them from the system.
      Parameters:
      client - The SocketIOClient that disconnected.

    • handleItemRemove

      public void handleItemRemove(com.corundumstudio.socketio.SocketIOClient client, Object data)
      Handles the removal of an item by a client. This method updates the lobby's list of removed items and broadcasts the change to all users in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      client - The SocketIOClient that removed the item.
      data - The data containing the removed item information.

    • handleLocationUpdate

      public void handleLocationUpdate(com.corundumstudio.socketio.SocketIOClient client, Object data)
      Handles the location update of a client. This method updates the user's coordinates in the lobby and broadcasts the change to all users in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      client - The SocketIOClient that updated their location.
      data - The data containing the updated coordinates.

    • handleClientConnect

      public void handleClientConnect(com.corundumstudio.socketio.SocketIOClient client)
      Handles the connection of a client to the server. This method authenticates the user, adds them to the system, and connects them to their lobby if applicable.
      Parameters:
      client - The SocketIOClient that connected.
